content: Neck Support EXO-S ### Categories: Home > Products > Health and safety > Accessories for exoskeletons- ### FEATURES:Features Helps to reduce the risk of neck injuries – provides relief to neck area and cervical spine during overhead work Lightweight design – for increased comfort on shoulders over long periods of use Easy to use – add, adjust for best fit and remove in seconds Applications Reducing neck fatigue when looking upwards for long periods while using with an EXO-S shoulder exoskeleton Suitable for virtually all prolonged overhead tasks, such as overhead grinding, installing pipes and drop ceilings or painting Must be fitted to an EXO-S construction exoskeleton (cannot be used separately) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Weight: 0.11 lb. Technical Data | Weight | 0.11 lb ### ITEMS- 2351393 - Neck Support EXO-S - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x Neck support
